channel.title: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?
channel.description:
Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?
I have looked at the tutorials, looked at scripts, and such.
But (not including functions from includes) is there some library of all the functions and everything to do with Scar?

item.title: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh I see. Thank you StarBlaster.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?

item.title: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Hit F1 in SCAR for the Procedures and Functions.

Just open the includes and look through them to see which others can be added in by including the include

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?

item.title: Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:1, topic:3219”]Is there a list of every function and everything to do with Scar?

I have looked at the tutorials, looked at scripts, and such.

But (not including functions from includes) is there some library of all the functions and everything to do with Scar?[/quote]

I was also wondering, if there is a complete list of al the procedures.

Surely there must be, and it’s probably under my nose but I am too lazy to look

Read full topic
